summary: This document is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding a draft government response letter to be filed in court on April 19, 2021. It shows coordination on legal filings in the Epstein case.

events.title: Government Response Filing Preparation
events.description: U.S. Attorney's Office personnel prepare and edit a draft government response letter to be filed in court regarding the Epstein case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain regarding a government legal filing in the Epstein case.
The filing was being prepared by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document shows ongoing legal activity in the Epstein case in 2021.
The email includes redacted recipient names (shown as USANYS designations).
